# IReferableStructure interface

Represents any model object that is referable by-name, i.e. where the concrete type has a

```csharp
QualifiedName
```

property, such as [`IConstant`](../Mendix.StudioPro.ExtensionsAPI.Model.Constants/IConstant.md) and [`IEntity`](../Mendix.StudioPro.ExtensionsAPI.Model.DomainModels/IEntity.md).

```csharp
public interface IReferableStructure : IStructure
```
